translations._Rb_HHrBAiC: Essential cookies: These cookies are required to use Meta Products and are necessary for our sites to work as intended.
translations.TKxPAUopwZt: Cookies from other companies: We use these cookies to show you ads off Meta Products and to provide features such as maps and videos on Meta Products. These cookies are optional.
translations.Z3TeSsBlS_4: You have control over the optional cookies that we use. Learn more about cookies and how we use them, and review or change your choices at any time in our {=m2}.
translations.c8BoJ4HGspC: We use cookies from {=m2} in order to show you ads off our Products, and provide features such as maps, payment services and video.
translations.lYKMHvrxc3j: We use cookies from other companies on our Products:
translations.DqUHnb5uD3M: To show you ads about our Products and features on other companies' apps and websites.
translations.CsD4zvW7caB: To provide features on our Products such as maps, payment services and video.
translations.hsEWE-UR8Wb: Features that you use on Meta Products will not be affected.
translations.--UTfGdp-x-: We'll be able to better personalise ads for you off Meta Products, and measure their performance.
translations.kzc1hBJ0Stb: Other companies will receive information about you by using their cookies.
translations.2FVV_9njvSm: If you don't allow these cookies
translations.mwIjDZ_AHeR: Some features on our products may not work.
translations.pIeqCgzuKwh: We won't use cookies from other companies to personalise ads for you off Meta Products, or measure their performance.
translations.nFHqEd9yK5v: Cookies are small pieces of text that are used to store and receive identifiers on a web browser. We use cookies and similar technologies to offer Meta Products and understand information that we receive about users, such as their activity on other websites and apps.
translations.wSCosvIDTug: If you don't have an account, we don't use cookies to personalise ads for you, and activity that we receive will only be used for the security and integrity of our Products.
translations.7ldnwZ7KiyI: Learn more about cookies and the similar technologies that we use in our {=m2}.
translations.vQ37HYxpK7V: Cookies help us provide, protect and improve the Meta Products, such as by personalising content, tailoring and measuring ads, and providing a safer experience.
translations.pkICeO8T8eM: While the cookies that we use may change from time to time as we improve and update the Meta Products, we use them for the following purposes:
translations.yQ0yoHOtCGe: Authentication to keep users logged in
translations.yptcsjXkCdj: To ensure security, site and product integrity
translations.Eh63YvsiONS: To provide advertising, recommendations, insights and measurement, if we show you ads
translations.aQI4WLhbIVT: To provide site features and services
translations.pEIQ3SIiPpZ: On third-party websites and apps to help companies that incorporate Meta technologies to share information with us about activity on their apps and websites.
translations.xZ3zYXdm2GV: Learn more about cookies and how we use them in our {=m2}.
translations.0DUTpozIE8D: Meta Products include the Facebook, Instagram and Messenger apps, and any other features, apps, technologies, software or services offered by Meta under our Privacy Policy.
translations.JDzu2zIwOJ1: Meta Products in our Privacy Policy
translations.XpMVqyeLIOM: You have control over the optional cookies that we use:
translations.y_mIUeKCgog: Our cookies on other apps and websites owned by companies that use Meta technologies, such as the Like button and Meta pixel, can be used, including to personalise your ads, if we show you ads.
translations.jvWx4MBd5Nu: We use cookies from other companies to show you ads off Meta Products, and to provide features such as maps and video on Meta Products.
translations.eO3pNviH7H5: You can review or change your choices at any time in your cookies settings.
translations.QZU2jlCPJ6b: You can manage your ad experience by visiting the following settings.
translations.vB_vnS3dMqa: If you have a Facebook account, you can manage how different data is used to personalise ads with these tools.
translations.Ng12m4Rzm2c: In Ad preferences, you can choose whether we show you ads and make choices about the information used to show you ads.
translations.hBc4X-mlOkw: If we show you ads, we use data that advertisers and other partners provide us with about your activity off Meta Company Products, including websites and apps to show you better ads. You can control whether we use this data to show you ads in {=m2}.
translations.q1DzJulZALP: To show you better ads, we use data that advertisers and other partners provide to us about your activity off Meta Company Products, including websites and apps. You can control whether we use this data to show you ads in your {=m1}.
translations.hDA7wRPkzSy: The Meta Audience Network is a way for advertisers to show you ads in apps and websites off the {=m1}. One of the ways in which Audience Network shows relevant ads is by using your ad preferences to determine which ads you may be interested in seeing. You can control this in your {=m3}.
translations.x3nQhaUr9pS: You can use your ad preferences to learn why you're seeing a particular ad and control how we use information that we collect to show you ads.
translations.8zn8OhSgRNw: You can review your off-Facebook activity, which is a summary of activity that businesses and organisations share with us about your interactions with them, such as visiting their apps or websites. They use our {=m1}, such as Facebook Login or the Meta pixel, to share this information with us. This helps us do things such as give you a more personalised experience on Meta Products. Learn more about {=m3}, how we use it and how you can manage it.
translations.nhaDBDTVYAG: You can review your off-Facebook activity, which is a summary of activity that businesses and organisations share with us about your interactions with them, such as visiting their apps or websites. They use our {=m1}, such as Facebook Login or the Meta pixel, to share this information with us. This helps us do things such as give you a more personalised experience on Meta Products. Learn more about {=m3}, how we use it and how you can manage it.
translations.0-e4IvjIQAl: Manage your ad experience in Accounts Centre
translations.VI9rxrGRFAY: Your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them. These controls vary by browser, and manufacturers may change both the settings that they make available and how they work at any time. As of 5 October 2020, you may find additional information about the controls offered by popular browsers at the links below. Certain parts of Meta Products may not work properly if you have disabled browser cookies. Please be aware that these controls are distinct from the controls that Facebook offers.
translations.fivggjHnkmn: We use cookies from {=m1} in order to show you ads off our Products, and provide features such as maps, payment services and video.
translations.gUVXlBcZHIR: We'll be able to better personalise ads for you off Meta Products and measure their performance.
translations.D38iOdKYh7F: We won't use cookies from other companies to personalise ads for you off Meta Products, or measure their performance.

dHjN-SijfYb.FACEBOOK: Some cookies are required to use Facebook. Review the available cookie controls and choose the cookies that you want to accept to continue.
dHjN-SijfYb.INSTAGRAM: Some cookies are required to use Instagram. Review the available cookie controls and choose the cookies that you want to accept to continue.
dHjN-SijfYb.OCULUS: Some cookies are required to use Oculus. Review the available cookie controls and choose the cookies you want to accept to continue.
dHjN-SijfYb.WORKPLACE: Some cookies are required to use Workplace. Review the available cookie controls and choose the cookies you want to accept to continue.

translations.BVdvvpUh71E: This is a shared setting on this browser. You can change this setting by turning off cookies in your browser.
translations.6ECeYYmtciH: What cookie settings can I control?
translations.Y-RGvvKXE8P: Other ways you can control your information
translations.YPgrt4H4ziB: Accept Facebook's primary advertising cookie on this browser, which is used predominantly to help deliver, measure and improve the relevancy of ads?

hjsGQJS3GWM.FACEBOOK: Accept cookies that come from companies other than Facebook, used to optimise services including personalising content (including ads), measuring ads, producing analytics and providing a safer experience?
hjsGQJS3GWM.INSTAGRAM: Accept cookies that come from companies other than Instagram, used to optimise services including personalising content (including ads), measuring ads, producing analytics and providing a safer experience?
hjsGQJS3GWM.OCULUS: Accept cookies that come from companies other than Oculus, used to optimise services including personalising content (including ads), measuring ads, producing analytics and providing a safer experience?
hjsGQJS3GWM.WORKPLACE: Accept cookies that come from companies other than Workplace, used to optimise services including personalising content (including ads), measuring ads, producing analytics and providing a safer experience?

translations.uokqKQJk3M8: If you don't want this cookie:
translations.oltDVauJwGH: You'll still see ads when you're on Facebook, and we'll use the information we have to deliver, measure and improve the relevancy of the ads you see. This includes information that you provide us with when you use our Facebook Products, your device information, and information from partners collected using other cookies and tracking technologies. You can still allow this cookie on browsers or devices if you don't accept it now, and if you do we'll use the information it collects where you have allowed it.
translations._BTtikkkscm: Some cookies are essential to use our services. To continue to Instagram, review the available cookie controls and make any optional selections that you'd like before accepting below.
translations.Q4z2WcrRdDP: Cookies help us provide, protect and improve our Workplace site and Workplace services, such as by personalising content and providing a safer experience. You can read more about the ways in which we use cookies and for what purposes in our {=m2}.
translations.9ghetczUyKF: Cookies help us provide, protect and improve our work accounts site services, such as by personalising content and providing a safer experience. You can read more about the ways in which we use cookies and for what purposes in our {=m2}.
translations.ThtZ9pewZK4: Some of the ways we use cookies from other sites include enabling the features that let you put GIFs in posts and comments, view videos and play games in Facebook Gaming. If you don't accept cookies from other sites, Facebook features such as these that rely on information from other sites and apps may not work.
translations.TSNPsMxiFE7: Without cookies from other sites, Instagram may not be able to embed tools from other websites that enable these features and help improve your experience.
translations.A9LIfYh3RWy: Some experiences that won't work without cookies from other companies include posting GIFs in posts and comments and viewing videos.
translations.0DFr4_Su6yQ: Follow the instructions provided by your website or mobile browser (usually located within the "Help", "Tools" or "Edit" facility) to modify your cookie settings. Please note that if you set your browser to disable cookies or other technologies, you may not be able to access certain parts of our Service, and other parts of our Service may not work properly.
translations.JqCZc4RkCrZ: Your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them. These controls vary by browser, and manufacturers may change both the settings that they make available and how they work at any time. As of 2 March 2021, you may find additional information about the controls offered by popular browsers at the links below. Certain parts of the Workplace site and/or the Workplace Services may not work properly if you have disabled browser cookie.
translations.DifTKNDdgnn: Your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them. These controls vary by browser, and manufacturers may change both the settings that they make available and how they work at any time. As of 9 August 2022, you may find additional information about the controls offered by popular browsers at the links below. Certain parts of the Work Accounts Site and/or the Work Accounts Services may not work properly if you have disabled browser cookies.
translations.go4Y-Trerwg: To learn more about the choices that advertisers provide generally for individuals to influence how information about their online activities over time and across third-party web sites or online services is collected and used, visit the Network Advertising Initiative at {=m1}, the Digital Advertising Alliance at {=m3} or the European Digital Advertising Alliance at {=m5}.
translations.w3L6C6WZnlr: In addition, your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them. These controls vary by browser, and manufacturers may change both the settings they make available and how they work at any time. As of 5 October 2020, you may find additional information about the controls offered by popular browsers at the links below. Certain parts of the {=m1} may not work properly if you have disabled browser cookie use.
translations.Tl1KqeNJM9s: Some of the ways we use cookies from other sites include enabling videos as well as real-time communication with our customer service agents. If you don't accept cookies from other sites, features such as these that rely on information from other sites may not work.
translations.XzPysATbwvH: If you don't allow these cookies:
translations._1WD8cgQTs2: We use tools from other companies for advertising and measurement services off Facebook Products, analytics, and to provide certain features and improve our services for you. These companies also use cookies.
translations.r0MEM5jdpd5: We'll be able to better personalise ads for you off Facebook Products and measure their performance
translations.OFdUQe1Sm4o: Features on our products will not be affected
translations.uFG3WEiGoyv: Other companies will receive information about you by using cookies
translations.-VUwOfBcAja: We won't use cookies from other companies to help personalise ads for you off Facebook Products or to measure their performance
translations.xVR7z_K1JIj: Some features on our products may not work

translations.RI0WLiX-g9K: Other ways you can control tracking
translations.jtGniKYxaWS: Please refresh the page and try again.
translations.VbsrkTrmfa_: You can opt out of seeing online interest-based ads from Meta and other participating companies through the {=m1} in the US, the {=m3} in Canada or the {=m5} in Europe or through your mobile device settings, if you are using Android, iOS 13 or an earlier version of iOS. Please note that ad blockers and tools that restrict our cookie use may interfere with these controls.
translations.URcIj8eqRwY: The advertising companies that we work with generally use cookies and similar technologies as part of their services. To learn more about how advertisers generally use cookies and the choices they offer, you can review the following resources:
translations.o-jx1tTfIHQ: We use cookies to help personalise and improve content and services, and provide a safer experience. You can review your cookie settings on your browser at any time. Learn more about cookie uses and controls in our {=m1}.

translations.Sm865wCULTD: We use cookies to help personalise and improve content and services, serve relevant ads and provide a safer experience. You can review your cookie controls at any time. Learn more about cookie uses and controls in our {=m1}.

translations.mMbkxt1ppiT: You can allow the use of all cookies or just essential cookies.
translations.eyuOnev_jP0: These cookies are required to use Facebook Company Products. They're necessary for these sites to work as intended.

translations.C0jwUwnJbib: You can allow the use of all cookies on this browser or you can choose more options. You can learn more about cookies and how we use them, and review or change your choice at any time in our {=m1}.

translations.14fpYvirGOp: Learn more about uses and controls in our {=m1}.
translations.t48KQxlPQmz: Your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them.
translations.aqSqd5X04Rx: These controls vary by browser, and manufacturers may change both the settings they make available and how they work at any time.
translations.qnSdbux0VSv: Additional information about the controls offered by popular browsers can be found at the links below.
translations.XIXThJd3bwN: Certain parts of WhatsApp Products may not work properly if you have disabled browser cookies.
